TestDescriptor.Name: Simple type handling with direct field access with introspection
TestDescriptor.Author: Sebastien Gignoux
TestDescriptor.Comment:
This test check the proper handling of simple type for introspected classes. All the field are accessed directly (and should be public...).
The Type tested are: - String - int - long - boolean - double - float - java.math.BigDecimal // Problem... - byte - date // Problem... - char
